text: Cristiana dos Santos Mendes Lôbo (August 18, 1957 — November 11, 2021) was a Brazilian journalist. She worked for GloboNews. She was a political commentator on Jornal das Dez and Globonews em Pauta, on GloboNews. She was born in Goiânia, Brazil. Lôbo died in São Paulo, Brazil on November 11, 2021 from multiple myeloma at the age of 64. ==References== Category:1957 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Deaths from multiple myeloma Category:Brazilian journalists Category:Political commentators Category:People from Goiânia
title: Cristiana Lôbo
